H0.text: Gabriel Loire, Mordecai Ardon and Marcelle Ferron are known for their art work in what medium. Mosaic

H1.text: Gabriel Loire, Mordecai Ardon and Marcelle Ferron are known for their art work in what medium. Tapestry

H2.text: Gabriel Loire, Mordecai Ardon and Marcelle Ferron are known for their art work in what medium. Ceramic

H3.text: Gabriel Loire, Mordecai Ardon and Marcelle Ferron are known for their art work in what medium. Stain glass

A4.text: Gabriel Loire was a French stained glass artist of the twentieth century whose extensive works... appear in many venues around the world.

A5.text: Loire's works include the use of slab glass (dalle de verre), a type of stained glass, in locations such as the Crowell Chapel and Grace Cathedral.
